description: A collection of diverse data types, including strings, integers, booleans, and timestamps, capturing various attributes for analysis. This dataset supports the examination of special character handling and data integrity across different formats.

metadata.description: Short string value that may represent a small identifier or code.
Integer value represented as a string; This column captures numeric data that is intended to be treated as an integer.
A string representation of a long integer value, which may include special characters.
Decimal value representing a precise numeric measurement, allowing for significant digits and decimal places.
A floating-point number representing a specific measurement or value, which may include decimal points.
Indicates a true or false condition; Represents a binary state for the data.
A double precision floating-point value that may represent a measurement or calculation result.
A string field that may contain special characters and is used for storing miscellaneous text data.
Date value represented in YYYY-MM-DD format, indicating a specific date.
Timestamp indicating the exact date and time of an event, formatted in ISO 8601 standard.
A decimal value with high precision, used for representing financial or measurement data.
